function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of thermal scanning technology to detect COVID-19 symptoms.","Impact":"False negatives leading to undetected cases of COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of thermal scanning equipment.","Technologies":"Thermal imaging system, artificial intelligence (AI), microphones, infrared cameras.","People":"Crowds, public building occupants, medical facility visitors.","Owner":"Public health authorities, building and facility owners."},{"Description":"Use of facial recognition technology to identify potential COVID-19 cases.","Impact":"Invasion of privacy and potential misidentification of individuals.","Mitigation":"Strict regulation and ethical guidelines for the use of facial recognition technology.","Technologies":"Facial recognition technology, optical cameras, global positioning system (GPS).","People":"Public building occupants, surveillance subjects.","Owner":"Government agencies, building and facility owners."},{"Description":"Integration of drone technology with COVID-19 symptom detection and surveillance.","Impact":"Privacy concerns related to drone surveillance and data collection.","Mitigation":"Establishment of clear guidelines and regulations for drone use in pandemic management.","Technologies":"Drones, thermal imaging system, artificial intelligence (AI), global positioning system (GPS), internet of things (IOT).","People":"Crowds, public building occupants, surveillance subjects.","Owner":"Government agencies, building and facility owners."}]}
